headline: Most Businesses Rush to AI Before They’re Ready. I Fix That. | Author, “Aligned Before AI” | Fractional Chief AI & Systems Officer | Building Structure Before Scale for Small Businesses & Nonprofits
summary: Most organizations are drowning in tools they don't need, solving for problems they haven't defined. I help small businesses and nonprofits get aligned before AI, build structure before scale, and create systems that serve people—not the other way around. THE PROBLEM Leaders buy systems before documenting their sales process. They buy automation before clarifying workflow. They chase AI before knowing what problems they're solving. Result? Expensive technology that creates chaos, not clarity. The tech industry profits from this confusion. I don't. ALIGNED BEFORE AI I published a book by this title because I'm tired of watching businesses waste money on premature technology. CLARITY BEFORE COMPLEXITY – Before tools, we clarify what you're trying to accomplish. Until you can articulate this, no software will save you. STRUCTURE BEFORE SCALE – You cannot automate chaos. If processes are broken, AI breaks them faster. We build documented workflows first, then introduce technology. HUMANS BEFORE HYPE – AI amplifies what exists. Confused teams get more confused. Aligned teams become force multipliers. WHAT I'VE BUILT As Founder of Align & Innovate, I provide fractional Chief AI & Systems Officer services to organizations needing strategic technology leadership. Before that, I co-founded Visuals by Momo, helping 50+ nonprofits tell emotionally resonant stories through documentary productions. That taught me: the best technology means nothing if you can't tell a coherent story about what you do. I bring that lens to systems work. Every CRM, every workflow, every AI strategy—it's storytelling. I also host Visual Eyes Podcast, exploring storytelling, technology, and community impact. WHO I WORK WITH Leaders tired of tools that promise transformation but deliver headaches. Leaders ready to invest in foundational systems instead of chasing shiny objects. What I don't do: Sell software you don't need. Build AI that impresses investors but confuses teams. What I do: Ask hard questions. Design systems that reduce friction. Train teams to own tools—not be owned by them. MY CREDENTIALS • AI+ Chief AI Officer Certified • Board of Directors, HandsOn South Florida • Author: "Aligned Before AI" (Amazon, 2025) • Co-Founder, Visuals by Momo I don't sell what you don't need. I help you build what works. 📖 "Aligned Before AI" on Amazon 🌐 aligninnovate.com | visualsbymomo.com 📧 chris@aligninnovate.com 🎙️ Visual Eyes Podcast

headline: Organizational Transformation Consultant | Executive Coach | Innovation and Strategy Leader
summary: I work with organizations and leaders who are trying to do something different, whether that’s rethinking their strategy, managing change, or building teams that actually function well. My background includes senior roles in higher education, leadership at a fast-growing education technology company, and over 15 years of consulting experience across sectors. Today, I lead transform.forward, a boutique consulting firm focused on strategy, organizational effectiveness, and leadership development. Our clients include public and private universities, government agencies, nonprofits, startups, corporations, and organizations in transition. The work often involves strategic planning, executive coaching, culture audits, org structure reviews, or facilitation of retreats and team development. Before launching transform.forward full time, I served as Chief of Staff and Assistant Vice President at a large private university, where I led division-wide strategy, oversaw $75M in projects and operating budgets, and built teams and systems to support change at scale. Earlier in my career, I helped scale an education tech company through multiple mergers and acquisitions, where I led consulting and research services, integrated marketing, customer advocacy, and product marketing. I’ve taught graduate courses on strategic planning, assessment, and leadership theory, and my research includes topics like gamification, student engagement, and the evolving role of Chief of Staff in complex institutions. I stay connected to the field through writing, speaking, and working directly with leaders who are trying to get unstuck and move forward with clarity.

As a boutique advisory and coaching firm, we bring a unique focus on change management that empowers our clients to navigate uncertainty with clarity, adaptability, and confidence. Our mission is simple: to help you transform challenges into opportunities and unlock your full potential. What sets us apart is our approach. We don’t believe in one-size-fits-all solutions. Instead, we combine best practices and custom frameworks drawn from multiple industries to deliver insights that are both innovative and actionable. Our curated teams ensure that every project is led by experts with the right experience and backgrounds to meet your unique needs. This means you’ll get a partnership tailored to your goals and grounded in proven strategies. Our clients range from higher education institutions and government agencies to non-profits and, increasingly, corporate leaders. Whether you're a university President reimagining your strategic plan,C-suite executive navigating organizational transformation, or a mid-level leader looking to grow, we’re here to help. Each offering is designed to help you align your vision with action, build resilient teams, and create meaningful, lasting impact. We don’t just deliver solutions; we build capacity, ensuring you and your organization are equipped to thrive long after our engagement ends. When you work with transform.forward, you’ll feel confident in our expertise, inspired to take the next step, and curious to explore what’s possible. Let’s move forward—together.

summary: I work with leaders, teams, and cultures in mid-sized and large corporations that are experiencing increased complexity and change. Engagement is likely low and the workplace culture could feel unfocused, chaotic, and even toxic. Not surprisingly, this leads to decreased performance, the loss of top talent, and dissatisfied customers. I provide customized coaching, consulting, and leadership development programs that: • Increase leadership effectiveness • Improve team dynamics • Develop workforce competency and agility in navigating change The coaching, training, and development support increases workforce engagement, productivity, collaboration, trust, and resilience...and makes work more enjoyable and fulfilling for all. headline: Investment, Risk Management & Sustainability Expert/Speaker/Advocate/Trainer/Coach Partnering with asset owners on their Responsible Investing journey.
summary: “Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.” — Margaret Mead, American Anthropologist The impact of climate change is seen and felt all around us. Damages from severe weather events surpassed $8 billion for 2024 alone, compared to an average of $422 million/yr. between 1983 and 2008 (Insurance Bureau of Canada). The World Bank estimates that 40 percent of the global population lives in places of high vulnerability to climate change. "Business as usual" investing could put asset owners at risk of not meeting their fiduciary responsibilities, being misaligned with rapidly evolving regulations/guidelines or simply being out of touch with their stakeholders’ sustainability convictions. I am the professional you can partner with and trust on your transition from the Institutional Investor you are to the Responsible Institutional Investor you aim to become. 1-Expertise and Experience: I am a qualified actuary (FCIA, FSA) and Chartered Investment Manager (CIM) with expertise in pension plan governance, funding, investing, ESG integration and management of climate-related risks and opportunities. I have 30 years of experience with global consulting firms, portfolio managers and plan sponsors. 2-Integrity and trustworthiness: As a member of the Canadian Institute of Actuaries (CIA) I adhere to strict Standards and Rules of Professional Conduct. I received the 2022 CIA President’s Award for my groundbreaking work as Chair of the Climate Change and Sustainability Committee serving the Institute’s 6,000 members. My clients value my honest communication, my creative thinking, and my rigorous analysis. I make my clients feel heard and respected. 3- Availability and affordability: You will have direct access to my in-depth knowledge of the Institutional Investment market to solve your Responsible Investment problems and challenges. I plan to manage my client load to maintain a high level of quality. My fees are affordable in comparison to large consulting firms. The following are some of the services I offer: • Education sessions for Board, management, or members • Diagnostic assessment with gap analysis vs. peers, regulations and best practice • Governance structure review • Workshop facilitation and action plan creation • Responsible Investment (RI) policy review/formulation and implementation • Climate Strategy development and implementation NEW STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP in 2025 WITH SAI Inc. Visit www.mathalian.com for more details or write to achoquet@mathalian.com

Through collaborative partnerships, clear education, and bilingual communication, we empower boards, trustees, and investment committees to make informed decisions that balance financial performance with your stakeholders' social and environmental ambition. Our mission is simple: partnering with you to strengthen conviction, manage risks (specific & systemic), set achievable performance goals, select managers and communicate your progress on your journey to a bright future for your beneficiaries.

headline: 💎Keynote Speaker & CALM Method™ Creator | I help people rebuild trust and reconnect where it matters most—at home, at work, and under pressure | Award-winning author with 20+ years frontline experience
summary: Hi, I’m Carlamay Sheremata. I’m a retired police officer, keynote speaker, award-winning author, and family conflict resolution specialist—but more than that, I’m a bridge-builder. Between systems and people. Between leaders and their teams. Between families and the youth they love. After 21 years in law enforcement—including 8.5 years as a School Resource Officer—I’ve seen what happens when people lose connection. I’ve watched families fracture, leaders burn out, teams implode, and kids fall through the cracks. Not because people didn’t care—but because they didn’t know how to lead through the hard stuff. That’s why I created the CALM Leadership Method™—a trust-centered, emotionally intelligent approach to leadership that works in real life. Under pressure. In crisis. In the moments that matter most. I now help corporate teams, educators, frontline professionals, and families lead with connection, rebuild trust where it’s been lost, and communicate clearly when it counts most—at home, at work, and everywhere in between. Whether I’m on stage speaking to executives, equipping frontline teams, or sitting across from a family in conflict, I bring the same message: Connection heals what correction can’t. And if we don’t fix the disconnection, we lose the people who need us most. I’m also the author of the award-winning book Youth Truth: Engaging in Conversations That Can Change Lives—a raw, practical guide that equips parents, educators, and mentors to connect with today’s youth on the tough topics that matter most. It’s not just a book—it’s a bridge between generations, emotions, and relationships. Through real stories, bold truths, and actionable tools, I teach people how to lead with clarity, courage, and compassion—without burning out or checking out. Because when we get connection right, everything changes. What I Speak & Train On: Trust-Centered Leadership in High-Stress Environments The CALM Method™: From Reactive to Regulated Leadership Building Emotionally Resilient Teams and Families The Bridge Between Home & Work: Leading from the Inside Out Youth Truth™: Conversations That Reach Today’s Kids Being Pink in a Blue World: Leading Authentically in Male-Dominated Spaces Let’s connect if you’re: A leader ready to retain your people—not lose them A team burned out from constant crisis A parent, coach, or educator ready to build trust with youth An event planner looking for a speaker who brings heart, humor, and real talk A human who believes leadership starts with presence—not position Let’s rebuild trust where it matters most—together.

job_description: Diamond in the Rough Consulting is more than a business—it’s a movement. We help leaders, teams, and families rebuild trust, lead with emotional intelligence, and reconnect where it matters most—at home, at work, and in the moments that shape everything. Founded by Carlamay Sheremata, a retired police officer, award-winning author, keynote speaker, and family conflict resolution specialist, our work is grounded in lived experience, not just theory. After 21 years on the frontlines of crisis—including 8.5 years as a School Resource Officer—Carlamay created the CALM Leadership Method™, a powerful, trust-centered approach that equips people to lead with clarity, connection, and courage under pressure. At Diamond in the Rough, we believe disconnection is costing us—our teams, our families, and our culture. We deliver bold keynotes, interactive workshops, and transformational training that help people communicate clearly, lead through conflict, and restore trust in high-stakes environments. Whether we’re equipping corporate leaders to retain their teams, training frontline professionals to navigate youth crisis, or guiding families through conflict resolution sessions—our approach is real, relatable, and results-driven. We don’t do surface work. We dig deep—because the diamond is always found in the rough. Our services include: Trust-centered keynote speaking Trauma-aware and CALM Method™ leadership training Youth-focused workshops and educator engagement Customized team development for emotionally intelligent workplaces Family conflict resolution (hourly or package-based support) If you’re tired of band-aid solutions and want to create lasting change—from the inside out—then you’re in the right place. Let’s rebuild what’s been broken and lead the way forward with heart, clarity, and connection. For more information on From Chaos to CALM keynotes and workshops, visit www.carlamaysheremata.com.
previous_job_description: Youth Truth: Engaging In Conversations That Can Change Lives 📖 Do you know what questions to ASK your kids, students, and the youth in your life to get them to talk with you? Wouldn’t it be great to have them actually respond and engage in conversation? It really is possible! In Youth Truth, you will discover how to approach the difficult topics that need to be talked about with your kids or students. You can do it with empathy and support. You can create safe spaces where youth feel valued and heard. Youth Truth can enhance your understanding of the issues that youth are dealing with these days. That way, you will know what the right questions are and the right way to ask the questions that actually touch hearts with the young people you want to reach. This gripping book delves into the raw, unfiltered world of today’s youth. Their lives are way more complex than most realize. It is a compelling and poignant exploration of the challenges faced by young souls, bringing to light the often overlooked and misunderstood battles they fight. From the haunting shadows of suicide to the insidious presence of bullying to the silent struggles of eating disorders and the desperate yearning just to be seen–this narrative bares it all. It is a powerful testament to the resilience, strength, and untold stories of a generation yearning for understanding and compassion. More than just a collection of stories, the author, a retired law enforcement and school resource officer, delivers a call to action, emphasizing the critical need for open, honest, and compassionate conversations. Youth Truth highlights how listening and engaging in meaningful dialogue can profoundly impact the lives of young people.

headline: CEO & Fundadora en Estimada Rebel | Rediseñando el liderazgo femenino en el mundo corporativo | Business Coach & Speaker
summary: Con más de 24 años liderando estrategias de marca, comunicación y relaciones públicas —principalmente en el sector financiero— he vivido en carne propia las brechas, silencios y techos que enfrentan las mujeres en el mundo corporativo. Por eso fundé Estimada Rebel, no como un proyecto más, sino como un movimiento para rediseñar el lugar que ocupamos las mujeres en las empresas: con poder, propósito y autonomía. Hoy, como CEO de Estimada Rebel, diseño e implemento programas de alto impacto como Confident Rebel y Rebel Leader, además de asesorar a organizaciones que buscan transformar sus culturas hacia un liderazgo más inclusivo. A través de nuestro enfoque estratégico, miles de mujeres han fortalecido su confianza, aprendido a comunicar su valor y avanzado hacia puestos de liderazgo con visión, ambición y sin culpa. Mi carrera comenzó mucho antes de emprender. He liderado equipos en GBM, la institución financiera independiente más grande de México, RIU Hotels & Resorts y el British Council, enfrentando de cerca los desafíos de crecer profesionalmente en estructuras donde las decisiones se toman —aún hoy— sin mujeres en la mesa. Esa experiencia no solo afiló mi mirada estratégica, sino que encendió mi convicción: no basta con abrir espacio, hay que preparar a más mujeres para ocuparlo con claridad, autoridad y resultados. Mi formación como Business Coach certificada por Newfield Consulting, bajo la metodología de Rafael Echeverría, y mi especialización en Liderazgo Femenino por Harvard Business School, respaldan una propuesta que integra desarrollo personal, confianza profesional y visión de negocio. Lo que ofrecemos en Estimada Rebel no es inspiración vacía: es estrategia aplicada para mujeres decididas a liderar. Creo firmemente que el talento femenino está listo para ocupar el centro de la conversación empresarial. Mi misión es asegurar que también esté listo para liderarla.

company_description: Estimada Rebel es una compañía de desarrollo profesional dedicada a transformar la manera en que las mujeres navegan, lideran y ascienden en el mundo corporativo. Nuestra misión es clara: inspirar a las mujeres para que lideren las empresas, incrementando el porcentaje de participación laboral, el porcentaje de mujeres en alta dirección, y eliminando la brecha salarial. Trabajamos principalmente con mujeres de entre 25 y 45 años que ya forman parte del entorno corporativo en México y Latinoamérica. A través de programas de coaching individual, bootcamps en vivo y formación grupal, las ayudamos a construir confianza, mejorar su comunicación, fortalecer su liderazgo y avanzar hacia roles de mayor responsabilidad y visibilidad. En Estimada Rebel creemos que el talento femenino no necesita permiso, sino estrategia, acompañamiento y comunidad. Por eso, creamos experiencias que combinan herramientas prácticas, retos profesionales reales y una red de mujeres que se impulsan mutuamente. Entre nuestros productos clave destacan: 🔸 Confident Rebel – Nuestro bootcamp insignia, enfocado en desbloquear la confianza profesional. 🔸 Rebel Leader – Programa de formación para mujeres que quieren liderar equipos con seguridad, visión y credibilidad. 🔸 Coaching uno a uno – Sesiones personalizadas para definir metas claras, trazar un plan y dar pasos concretos hacia el siguiente nivel. Además, colaboramos con empresas que buscan acelerar el desarrollo del liderazgo femenino en sus equipos, ofreciendo soluciones internas con impacto medible. Creemos que aumentar la participación de mujeres en la fuerza laboral, en puestos directivos y en las decisiones estratégicas no es solo una cuestión de justicia: es una decisión inteligente y urgente.

headline: On-Demand HR Partner for Skilled Trades & Service Based Business | Practical HR Support for Small, Growing Businesses | I Help Make HR Simple, Clear & Manageable
summary: I’ve spent my entire career inside HR. But the people I care about most aren’t sitting in corporate boardrooms. They’re running skilled trades and service businesses. They’re out in the field early, managing crews, juggling schedules, solving problems in real time — and doing everything they can to keep the work moving and their people supported. And almost every one of them has said some version of the same thing to me: “I know HR matters… I just don’t have the time. And honestly, I’m not even sure where to start.” That’s exactly why I founded On Demand HR Solutions. Small, growing trades businesses don’t need corporate HR theory or overbuilt policies that don’t fit how the work actually gets done. They need simple, practical HR support — delivered in a way that works alongside the business, not on top of it. That’s where I come in. I work as an independent on-demand HR partner for skilled trades businesses, and I offer a few clear ways to get support, depending on what you need right now: HR SOS Session A focused, one-hour working session to tackle one specific HR issue — a people problem, compliance question, hiring concern, or “this just came up and I need help” situation. HR Blueprint A short-term, hands-on engagement to put the HR foundations in place — clear policies, better hiring and onboarding, and simple systems that bring structure and consistency to how you manage your crew. HR Advisory Ongoing HR support for owners who want a trusted partner in their corner — someone they can call, message, or loop in when questions come up, decisions need to be made, or issues start to surface. No over-engineered solutions. No corporate speak. No judgment. Just honest, practical HR support designed for businesses where the work happens in the field. I believe HR should make running a business easier — not harder. If you’re not sure which option makes sense, that’s okay. Most people aren’t. Send me a message here on LinkedIn and tell me what’s going on. I’ll help you figure out the simplest next step. 📥 Message me on LinkedIn — I’m just one DM away.
skills: Human Resources (HR), Fractional HR Support, HR Metrics, HR Solutions, HR Software, HR Project Management, Workforce Planning, Employee Learning & Development, Labor Relations, Job Description Development, Hiring, Service Delivery, Performance Appraisal, Training and Development (HR), Conflict Management, Organizational Development, Employee Engagement, Leadership Development, People Management, Change Management, Emotional Intelligence, Conflict Resolution, Personal Accountability, Entrepreneurship, Human Resources Generalist, Human Resources Administration, Payroll Administration, Global Human Resources Management, Strategic Human Resources Leadership, Organizational Effectiveness, Human Resources Operations, HR Management, HR Consulting, HR Policies, HR Strategy, Human Resources, HRIS, Leadership, Employee Relations, Onboarding, Benefits Administration, Performance Management, Management, Talent Acquisition, Personnel Management, Succession Planning, Talent Management, Team Building, Deferred Compensation, Medical Devices
job_description: After more than 30 years leading HR in complex corporate environments, I started noticing a pattern. Small, growing skilled trades businesses were being asked to manage the same HR responsibilities: hiring, onboarding, safety, compliance, employee issues — without the time, support, or internal HR teams that larger companies rely on. Most owners don't want to “do HR.” They just wanted the work to run smoothly, their crews supported, and their business protected. So I founded On Demand HR Solutions to meet them where they are. Today, I work as an on-demand HR partner for skilled trades and field-based businesses, helping owners put practical HR systems in place that actually work in real life. My focus is HR operations and people management that supports how trades businesses run day to day. That includes everything from hiring and onboarding crews, to setting clear expectations, handling employee issues, and staying compliant as the business grows. I step in where HR usually falls through the cracks and help bring structure, clarity, and consistency without overcomplicating things. What this looks like in practice: - Acting as the HR department for small trades businesses, providing on-demand guidance, HR administration, and compliance support - Supporting owners through sensitive employee relations issues with a balance of compassion, clarity, and compliance - Building right-sized HR foundations — handbooks, policies, onboarding processes, and basic systems that crews can actually follow - Providing fractional or interim HR support when a business needs experienced HR leadership without hiring full-time - Helping owners move from reactive, day-to-day people issues to more stable, repeatable ways of managing their teams This work allows me to do what I care about most: Making HR feel manageable for business owners who already have enough on their plates — and helping trades businesses grow without the constant stress of “figuring it out as they go.”
company_description: Are you trying to run your business but constantly pulled into HR tasks you didn’t sign up for? Writing policies, handling employee issues, figuring out compliance... it’s not why you started your business. But it is what keeps you up at night. And if you’re nodding along, then we might be a great fit. 👋 Hi, I’m Norma. Founder of On Demand HR Solutions, and your go-to partner for real, reliable, roll-up-my-sleeves HR support. I’ve spent 30+ years working in corporate HR at every level, from frontline operations to executive leadership. I’ve built HR functions from the ground up, navigated mergers and acquisitions, led compliance strategies, and supported thousands of employees across industries. Today, I help small business owners who don’t have an HR department, but need one. You're growing but overwhelmed. You want structure without red tape. You need support that fits your business—not the other way around. That’s where I come in. At On Demand HR Solutions, I provide: - Fractional HR leadership & strategy - Custom employee handbooks & policy development - Employee relations & compliance guidance - Onboarding, payroll processing & admin support - Ongoing advisory—via email, Voxer, or Zoom Whether you’re onboarding your first employee or navigating a tricky situation, I help you handle it well, legally, and in a way that aligns with your values and meets you where you're at now. My clients range from 1 employee to growing teams of 20+. Some need a long-term partner. Others need a one-off project done right. Either way, they know I’ll bring calm, clarity, and real results. 💬 Let's talk. Here's how we can work together: 1. Free 30-minute consultation – Let’s explore your HR needs. 2. Monthly support packages – Ongoing HR help without full-time cost. 3. Project-based solutions – Handbooks, audits, policy revamps & more. Consultation: https://savvycal.com/HRsolutions/smallbusiness Solve a problem quick: https://www.ondemandhrsolutions.com/hr-sos

previous_job_title: HR Leadership Roles (Head of Global HR Service Delivery, Head of HR - Corporate, HR Manager)
previous_job_description: While my title at Integra LifeSciences changed over 16 years, the constant was transformation. Integra’s growth-by-acquisition strategy meant the business—and HR—were always evolving. Every acquisition brought new people, systems, and challenges, giving me the opportunity to reinvent HR over and over again. It often felt like working for a dozen companies within one. In my final role as Head of Global HR Service Delivery, I built and led what became the one-stop-shop for employee support across payroll, benefits, onboarding, leave of absence, employee relations and more. I launched ServiceNow globally, to streamline employee inquiries, reducing response times to under 24 hours, and creating a single source of truth for HR processes. This work supported a dynamic, fast-scaling organization where clear, efficient HR processes were critical. But beyond the systems and processes, what I’m most proud of is how we made HR approachable again—turning a fragmented, confusing experience into one where employees felt supported and leaders had the tools they needed to lead confidently. Earlier, as Head of HR for Corporate Functions, I served as the executive HR partner to C-Suite Finance, IT, Legal, Business Development, and Scientific leaders—supporting them through organization design, restructuring, and workforce planning. I helped leaders build talent strategies, navigate organizational changes, and integrate acquired teams seamlessly into the business. As HR Manager, I supported global operations, quality, regulatory, and commercial sales teams, leading recruitment and retention strategies, launching training programs, and guiding leaders through performance management and employee relations issues. Integra was where I learned to thrive in ambiguity, manage change without losing sight of people, and ensure HR always aligned with the evolving needs of the business.

headline: Delivery Director | Agile Strategist | Relationship Building | Strategic Planning | Winter Sports | Father of two wonderful young men
summary: I am a founder and agile strategist at Loghan Partners, a consulting firm that helps clients achieve organizational growth and transformation through agile principles and practices. I have over 15 years of experience in leading and coaching agile teams, delivering customer-centric products and services, helping cultures in transition, and facilitating process improvement and innovation. As an agile practitioner, I have a proven track record of building relationships within and between units, creating and sharing a common high-level vision, and aligning it with the details of day-to-day work. I have worked with clients from diverse industries and sectors, such as Energy, Consulting, Fortune 100, and higher education, in the US and overseas. I am passionate about enabling teams to adapt, prioritize, and collaborate effectively, using tools such as Jira Align, Agile Maturity Assessments, and Product Mindset Training.

job_description: I joined Zifo as LATAM Delivery Director to lead our expansion into Latin America, partnering with Zifo senior leadership to develop and execute the strategic and operational goals of LATAM Service Team. I will be building and leading a local, on-site team supporting various Biotech, Analytics and Digital capabilities aligning with enterprise IT strategies and product roadmaps.
company_description: We help science-driven organisations innovate for a better future through our full range of specialist scientific informatics services. If your company has Laboratory/R&D, Manufacturing or Trial operations and strives to push boundaries, our informatics services are designed for you. We deliver a full range of services including Digital Transformation Coaching, Business Analysis, Program & Project Management, Managed Services, Validation, and Custom Development & Integrations. These services are supported by specialist expertise in Chem & Bioinformatics, Data Science, Cloud, HPC, Instrument Data, MultiOmics, Data Modeling, Semantics, and AI&ML. We speak the language of science and technology and support our customers and partners to discover, develop, manufacture and test products and solutions that support global health and wellbeing. The only way we can do this is with our people. We believe that the scientific community’s most important duty to the world is to stay curious. And this is what we do at Zifo. We strive to stay curious, day in and day out. Asking the right questions, and listening to provide the right solutions. Contact us at info@zifornd.com.

headline: Cleaning Business Owner | Mentor | 33+ Years Industry Experience | Creator of The Cleaning Business Playbook™ | Helping Cleaning Businesses Launch, Grow & Scale With Proven Systems
summary: Olivia Rush is a Cleaning Business Owner and Mentor with over 33 years of real-world industry experience. I help women ( and men) build profitable, professional cleaning businesses with structure, clarity, and purpose. After 33+ years of owning and operating a successful cleaning business, I saw the same pattern over and over—hardworking people starting without the pricing, systems, or strategy needed to grow sustainably. That’s why I created Start & Succeed: The Cleaning Business Playbook™. This is not theory. It’s built from real-world experience—tested in the field, refined through growth, and rooted in integrity, excellence, and faith. Through my work, I support women who want more than just “busy work.” I help them build businesses that produce: ✔ consistent income ✔ operational stability ✔ long-term ownership ✔ and peace in what they are building If you’re ready to stop guessing and start building with clarity, confidence, and purpose—I’m here to walk the journey with you. 📘 Creator of The Cleaning Business Playbook™ 🌱 Faith-led | Strategy-driven | Built for sustainability 🏆 My Cleaning Lady – Durham’s Best Cleaning Service | Excellence in Cleaning with a Purpose, Care & Trust! 🏆 ✨ ✨
skills: Business Coaching, cleanng business consultant, Strategic Planning, Public Speaking, Social Media, Social Media Marketing, Sales, Teaching, Event Planning, Marketing Strategy, Program Management, Marketing, Healthcare, Public Relations, Team Building, Budgets, Social Networking, Community Outreach, Fundraising, Research, Team Leadership, Marketing Communications
job_description: As a Cleaning Business Coach, I help women and new business owners launch, organize, and scale profitable cleaning companies using real-world proven systems. With over 33 years of experience owning and operating My Cleaning Lady Cleaning Service, I teach the structure, pricing, and operational standards that create stable income and long-term success. I am the creator of The Cleaning Business Playbook™, a step-by-step blueprint that equips cleaning business owners with the confidence, systems, and strategy needed to build a professional and dependable service business.
previous_job_description: With over 34 years of hands-on experience, I lead a top-tier, premium cleaning service dedicated to bringing peace, order, and excellence into every home we serve. As a wife, mother of five, and grandmother, I deeply understand how much a clean home restores a true sense of comfort and control. When life feels overwhelming, your home should feel like your sanctuary — a place of clarity, calm, and care. We don’t just clean houses — we help care for the home and the family who lives in it. My Cleaning Lady Cleaning Service is built on integrity, dependability, and a spirit of excellence. We go beyond surface cleaning to deliver true home care, helping our clients lighten their load and live in an environment that supports both peace and productivity. Let us take the stress off your shoulders — so you can focus on what matters most.
previous_company: My Cleaning Lady Cleaning Service, Durham NC
